ä¸‰è§’ç½‘æ ¼æ•°æ®ç»“æ„

ä¸‰è§’ç½‘æ ¼æ˜¯å¤šè¾¹å½¢ç½‘æ ¼çš„ä¸€ç§ï¼Œå¤šè¾¹å½¢ç½‘æ ¼åˆè¢«ç§°ä¸ºâ€œMeshâ€ï¼Œæ˜¯è®¡ç®—æœºå›¾å½¢å­¦ä¸­ç”¨äºä¸ºå„ç§ä¸è§„åˆ™ç‰©ä½“å»ºç«‹æ¨¡å‹çš„ä¸€ç§æ•°æ®ç»“æ„ã€‚ç°å®ä¸–ç•Œä¸­çš„ç‰©ä½“è¡¨é¢ç›´è§‚ä¸Šçœ‹éƒ½æ˜¯ç”±æ›²é¢æ„æˆçš„ï¼›è€Œåœ¨è®¡ç®—æœºä¸–ç•Œä¸­ï¼Œç”±äºåªèƒ½ç”¨ç¦»æ•£çš„ç»“æ„å»æ¨¡æ‹Ÿç°å®ä¸­è¿ç»­çš„äº‹ç‰©ã€‚æ‰€ä»¥ç°å®ä¸–ç•Œä¸­çš„æ›²é¢å®é™…ä¸Šåœ¨è®¡ç®—æœºé‡Œæ˜¯ç”±æ— æ•°ä¸ªå°çš„å¤šè¾¹å½¢é¢ç‰‡å»ç»„æˆçš„ã€‚è¿™æ ·çš„å°é¢ç‰‡çš„é›†åˆå°±è¢«ç§°ä½œMeshã€‚

stlç½‘æ ¼æ–‡ä»¶æ ¼å¼

æ–‡ä»¶èµ·å§‹çš„80ä¸ªå­—èŠ‚æ˜¯æ–‡ä»¶å¤´ï¼Œç”¨äºå­˜è´®æ–‡ä»¶åï¼›
ç´§æ¥ç€ç”¨ 4 ä¸ªå­—èŠ‚çš„æ•´æ•°æ¥æè¿°æ¨¡å‹çš„ä¸‰è§’é¢ç‰‡ä¸ªæ•°ï¼Œ åé¢é€ä¸ªç»™å‡ºæ¯ä¸ªä¸‰è§’é¢ç‰‡çš„å‡ ä½•ä¿¡æ¯ã€‚æ¯ä¸ªä¸‰è§’é¢ç‰‡å ç”¨å›ºå®šçš„50ä¸ªå­—èŠ‚ï¼Œä¾æ¬¡æ˜¯:

ä¸€ä¸ªå®Œæ•´äºŒè¿›åˆ¶STLæ–‡ä»¶çš„å¤§å°ä¸ºä¸‰è§’å½¢é¢ç‰‡æ•°ä¹˜ä»¥ 50å†åŠ ä¸Š84ä¸ªå­—èŠ‚ã€‚

æ ¹æ®81~84å­—èŠ‚è¯»å‡ºçš„ä¸‰è§’é¢ç‰‡ä¸ªæ•°è¿›è¡Œå¾ªç¯ï¼Œä¾æ¬¡è¯»å‡ºæ¯ä¸ªä¸‰è§’é¢ç‰‡çš„æ³•çº¿å’Œä¸‰ä¸ªé¡¶ç‚¹æ•°æ®ï¼Œä»¥åŠåœ¨æœ¬æ¬¡è®¡ç®—ä¸­å¯å¿½ç•¥çš„é¢ç‰‡å±æ€§ä¿¡æ¯ï¼Œå­˜å…¥facesæ•°ç»„ä¸­ã€‚
æ•´äº†æ®µä»£ç ï¼š

#include<stdio.h>#include<stdlib.h>#include<string.h>//æ–‡ä»¶å¤´ï¼Œå…±84å­—èŠ‚struct Head{    char partName[80];//é›¶ä»¶åç§°    int  faceNum;//é¢çš„æ•°ç›®};//ç‚¹ï¼Œä¸‰ä¸ªfloatç±»å‹çš„ï¼Œå¤§å°ä¸º12å­—èŠ‚struct Point{    float x;    float y;    float z;};//æ³•çº¿struct Normal{    float i;    float j;    float k;};//ä¸‰è§’é¢ï¼Œç”±ä¸€ä¸ªæ³•çº¿ï¼Œä¸‰ä¸ªç‚¹ï¼Œå’Œä¸€ä¸ªä¸¤å­—èŠ‚çš„ä¿ç•™é¡¹ï¼Œä¸€å…±50å­—èŠ‚struct Face{    Normal normal;    Point  p1;    Point  p2;    Point  p3;    char  info[2];//ä¿ç•™æ•°æ®ï¼Œå¯ä»¥ä¸ç”¨ç®¡};int main(){    Head head;    FILE* fp;    char fileName[128];    printf("è¯·è¾“å…¥æ–‡ä»¶åï¼š
");    gets_s(fileName);//æ§åˆ¶å°é‡Œè¾“å…¥æ–‡ä»¶åç§°    fp = fopen(fileName, "rb");    if (fp != NULL)    {        fread(head.partName, 80, 1, fp);//è·å–éƒ¨ä»¶å        fread(&head.faceNum, 4, 1, fp);//è·å–ä¸‰è§’é¢ç‰‡çš„æ•°ç›®    }    Face* faces = (Face*)malloc(head.faceNum * sizeof(Face));//æ ¹æ®ä¸‰è§’é¢ç‰‡çš„æ•°ç›®ï¼Œåˆ›å»ºä¸€ä¸ªFaceç±»å‹çš„æ•°ç»„    //å¾ªç¯è¯»å–ä¸‰è§’é¢ç‰‡æ•°æ®    for (int i = 0; i < head.faceNum; i++)    {        fread(&faces[i].normal, 12, 1, fp);//è¯»å–æ³•çº¿æ•°æ®        fread(&faces[i].p1, 12, 1, fp);//è¯»å–é¡¶ç‚¹1çš„æ•°æ®        fread(&faces[i].p2, 12, 1, fp);//è¯»å–é¡¶ç‚¹2çš„æ•°æ®        fread(&faces[i].p3, 12, 1, fp);//è¯»å–é¡¶ç‚¹3çš„æ•°æ®        fread(&faces[i].info, 2, 1, fp);//è¯»å–ä¿ç•™é¡¹æ•°æ®ï¼Œè¿™ä¸€é¡¹ä¸€èˆ¬æ²¡ä»€ä¹ˆç”¨ï¼Œè¿™é‡Œé€‰æ‹©è¯»å–æ˜¯ä¸ºäº†ç§»åŠ¨æ–‡ä»¶æŒ‡é’ˆ    }    fclose(fp);    printf("STLæ–‡ä»¶è§£æå¦‚ä¸‹ï¼š
");    printf("ä¸‰è§’å½¢æ•°ç›®ï¼š");    printf("%d
", head.faceNum);    printf("å„é¢çš„é¡¶ç‚¹å’Œæ³•çº¿æ•°æ®å¦‚ä¸‹ï¼š
");    //åœ¨æ§åˆ¶å°ä¸Šè¾“å‡ºSTLæ–‡ä»¶çš„æ•°æ®    for (int i = 0; i < head.faceNum; i++)    {        printf("é¢%d
", i + 1);        printf("æ³•çº¿ï¼š
");        printf("%f  %f  %f
", faces[i].normal.i, faces[i].normal.j, faces[i].normal.k);        printf("é¡¶ç‚¹æ•°æ®ï¼š
");        printf("%f  %f  %f
", faces[i].p1.x, faces[i].p1.y, faces[i].p1.z);        printf("%f  %f  %f
", faces[i].p2.x, faces[i].p2.y, faces[i].p2.z);        printf("%f  %f  %f
", faces[i].p2.x, faces[i].p2.y, faces[i].p2.z);    }    return 0;}

è¯»å…¥å°é›¶ä»¶ä¹‹åæ˜¯è¿™ä¸ªæ•ˆæœ

ä½†å…¶å®åªè¦ä¿ç•™è¯»å…¥çš„éƒ¨åˆ†å°±è¡Œï¼Œä¸å¿…è¾“å‡ºã€‚åé¢çš„è®¡ç®—ä¹Ÿéƒ½æ˜¯åœ¨è¿™å¾ªç¯ä¹‹ä¸­è¿›è¡Œã€‚

è®¡ç®—è¡¨é¢ç§¯

2020/7/30 å°è¯•å¤±è´¥
2020/8/3 æ¯ç­å§
2020/8/7 ä¸è¿‡å¦‚æ­¤

æ ¹æ®ä¸Šä¸€èŠ‚ä¸­æå–çš„ä¸‰è§’é¢ç‰‡ï¼Œä¾æ¬¡è®¡ç®—é¢ç§¯ã€‚
å…ˆè®¡ç®—å‡ºä¸‰ç»´ç©ºé—´ä¸­å„è¾¹é•¿çš„é•¿åº¦saï¼Œsbï¼Œscï¼›å†åˆ©ç”¨æµ·ä¼¦å…¬å¼è¿›è¡Œé¢ç§¯è®¡ç®—ã€‚
æœ€åç›¸åŠ ç®—å‡ºé¢ç§¯ä¹‹å’Œå³ä¸ºæ€»è¡¨é¢ç§¯sumã€‚

for (int i = 0; i < head.faceNum; i++)    {        double sa = sqrt((faces[i].p1.x - faces[i].p2.x) * (faces[i].p1.x - faces[i].p2.x) + (faces[i].p1.y- faces[i].p2.y) * (faces[i].p1.y - faces[i].p2.y) + (faces[i].p1.z- faces[i].p2.z) * (faces[i].p1.z - faces[i].p2.z));        double sb = sqrt((faces[i].p2.x - faces[i].p3.x) * (faces[i].p2.x - faces[i].p3.x) + (faces[i].p2.y - faces[i].p3.y) * (faces[i].p2.y - faces[i].p3.y) + (faces[i].p2.z - faces[i].p3.z) * (faces[i].p2.z - faces[i].p3.z));        double sc = sqrt((faces[i].p3.x - faces[i].p1.x) * (faces[i].p3.x - faces[i].p1.x) + (faces[i].p3.y - faces[i].p1.y) * (faces[i].p3.y - faces[i].p1.y) + (faces[i].p3.z - faces[i].p1.z) * (faces[i].p3.z - faces[i].p1.z));        double sp = (sa + sb + sc) / 2;        sum = sum + sqrt(sp * (sp - sa) * (sp - sb) * (sp - sc));    }

è®¡ç®—ä½“ç§¯

2020/8/8 ğŸ‘´æˆåŠŸäº†

ç»å†äº†Pythonå’ŒPè¯­è¨€ç¡¬ç®—çŸ©é˜µçš„çº ç»“ä¹‹åï¼Œæˆ‘æ¯…ç„¶é€‰æ‹©äº†åœ¨è™šæ‹Ÿæœºä¸Šç”¨Eigenæ•´ï¼ŒPythonå°±æ˜¯ä¸ªå¼Ÿå¼Ÿï¼
ä¸å¾—ä¸è¯´Linuxä¸ŠKDevelopç¡®å®è€æ—§ï¼Œå¾ˆæœ‰ä¸Šä¸ªä¸–çºªä¹åå¹´ä»£å¤§å¤´è®¡ç®—æœºçš„è´¨æ„Ÿã€‚

å‚è€ƒäº†ä¸€ç‚¹è®ºæ–‡çš„ç®—æ³•å’Œåšå®¢çš„ä»£ç ã€‚
å°†ä¸€ä¸ªä¸æ‰€æœ‰ä¸‰è§’é¢ç‰‡éƒ½ä¸ç›¸äº¤çš„é¢ä½œä¸ºæŠ•å½±é¢ï¼Œæ­¤å¤„å–z = -10ã€‚ä¸‰è§’é¢ç‰‡åŠå…¶åœ¨z = -10å¹³é¢çš„æŠ•å½±æ„æˆäº†ä¸€ä¸ªå‡¸äº”é¢ä½“ï¼Œè®¡ç®—æ­¤äº”é¢ä½“ä½“ç§¯å†æ±‚å’Œå³ä¸ºæ€»ä½“ç§¯vã€‚
å‡¸äº”é¢ä½“vså¯åˆ†å‰²æˆä¸‰ä¸ªå››é¢ä½“v1ï¼Œv2ï¼Œv3ï¼›è€Œå››é¢ä½“ä½“ç§¯å¯åˆ©ç”¨ä¸‹å…¬å¼ï¼Œä½¿ç”¨Eigenåº“æ¥ç®€åŒ–çŸ©é˜µè¿ç®—ã€‚
è®¡ç®—å‡ºå„ä¸ªé¢ç‰‡çš„æŠ•å½±ä½“ç§¯åï¼Œå°†é¢ç‰‡æ³•çº¿å’ŒæŠ•å½±é¢æ³•çº¿ç‚¹ä¹˜æ¥åˆ¤å®šæ˜¯ä¸Šè¡¨é¢è¿˜æ˜¯ä¸‹è¡¨é¢ã€‚è‹¥s>0åˆ™ä¸ºä¸Šè¡¨é¢ï¼Œè¯¥æŠ•å½±ä½“ç§¯ä¸ºæ­£ï¼Œè‹¥s<0åˆ™ä¸ºä¸‹è¡¨é¢ï¼Œè¯¥æŠ•å½±ä½“ç§¯ä¸ºè´Ÿã€‚

for (int i = 0; i < head.faceNum; i++)    {        double x1,x2,x3,y1,y2,y3,z1,z2,z3;        x1=faces[i].p1.x;y1=faces[i].p1.y;z1=faces[i].p1.z;        x2=faces[i].p2.x;y2=faces[i].p2.y;z2=faces[i].p2.z;        x3=faces[i].p3.x;y3=faces[i].p3.y;z3=faces[i].p3.z;        Eigen::Matrix<double,4,4>matrix_44;        matrix_44 << 1,1,1,1,x1,x2,x3,x2,y1,y2,y3,y2,z1,z2,z3,-10;        double v1=abs(matrix_44.determinant())*(1.0/6.0);        matrix_44 << 1,1,1,1,x1,x1,x2,x3,y1,y1,y2,y3,z1,-10,-10,z3;        double v2=abs(matrix_44.determinant())*(1.0/6.0);        matrix_44 << 1,1,1,1,x1,x2,x3,x3,y1,y2,y3,y3,-10,-10,-10,z3;        double v3=abs(matrix_44.determinant())*(1.0/6.0);        double vs=v1+v2+v3;        Eigen::Matrix<double,1,3>f;        f << faces[i].normal.i, faces[i].normal.j, faces[i].normal.k;        Eigen::Matrix<double,3,1>p;        p << 0,0,1;        double s = f.dot(p);        if(s>0){          v=v+vs;        }else if(s<0){          v=v-vs;        }    }

æ€»ç»“

å­¦ä¹ äº†å¦‚ä½•ç”¨cè¯­è¨€è¯»å…¥stlæ–‡ä»¶ï¼Œå’Œmeshçš„ç‰¹å¾ï¼Œè¡¨é¢ç§¯ã€ä½“ç§¯è®¡ç®—æ–¹æ³•ã€‚å¹¶å¤ä¹ äº†EIgençš„ä½¿ç”¨ã€‚
ä»¥ä¸‹æ˜¯æ€»ä»£ç ï¼š

#include <iostream>#include <stdio.h>#include <stdlib.h>#include <string.h>#include <math.h>#include <Eigen/Core>#include <Eigen/Dense>using namespace std;using namespace Eigen;struct Head    {    char partName[80];    //æ–‡ä»¶å¤´    int  faceNum;    //é¢ç‰‡ä¸ªæ•°};struct Point    //é¡¶ç‚¹{    float x;    float y;    float z;};struct Normal    //æ³•çº¿ï¼Œk>0ä¸Šè¡¨é¢ï¼Œk<0ä¸‹è¡¨é¢{    float i;    float j;    float k;};struct Face        //å•ä½ä¸‰è§’é¢ï¼Œä¸€æ¡æ³•çº¿ï¼Œä¸‰ä¸ªé¡¶ç‚¹{    Normal normal;        Point  p1;    Point  p2;    Point  p3;    char  info[2];    //ä¿ç•™æ•°æ®ï¼Œå±æ€§ä¿¡æ¯};int main(){    Head head;    FILE* fp;    char fileName[128];    fp = fopen("1.stl", "rb");    if (fp != NULL)    {        fread(head.partName, 80, 1, fp);        fread(&head.faceNum, 4, 1, fp);    }    Face* faces = (Face*)malloc(head.faceNum * sizeof(Face));    for (int i = 0; i < head.faceNum; i++)    {        fread(&faces[i].normal, 12, 1, fp);        fread(&faces[i].p1, 12, 1, fp);        fread(&faces[i].p2, 12, 1, fp);        fread(&faces[i].p3, 12, 1, fp);        fread(&faces[i].info, 2, 1, fp);    }    fclose(fp);    double sum = 0;        //è¡¨é¢ç§¯    double v=0;        //ä½“ç§¯    for (int i = 0; i < head.faceNum; i++)    {        //è¡¨é¢ç§¯è®¡ç®—        double sa = sqrt((faces[i].p1.x - faces[i].p2.x) * (faces[i].p1.x - faces[i].p2.x) + (faces[i].p1.y- faces[i].p2.y) * (faces[i].p1.y - faces[i].p2.y) + (faces[i].p1.z- faces[i].p2.z) * (faces[i].p1.z - faces[i].p2.z));        double sb = sqrt((faces[i].p2.x - faces[i].p3.x) * (faces[i].p2.x - faces[i].p3.x) + (faces[i].p2.y - faces[i].p3.y) * (faces[i].p2.y - faces[i].p3.y) + (faces[i].p2.z - faces[i].p3.z) * (faces[i].p2.z - faces[i].p3.z));        double sc = sqrt((faces[i].p3.x - faces[i].p1.x) * (faces[i].p3.x - faces[i].p1.x) + (faces[i].p3.y - faces[i].p1.y) * (faces[i].p3.y - faces[i].p1.y) + (faces[i].p3.z - faces[i].p1.z) * (faces[i].p3.z - faces[i].p1.z));        double sp = (sa + sb + sc) / 2;        sum = sum + sqrt(sp * (sp - sa) * (sp - sb) * (sp - sc));        //ä½“ç§¯è®¡ç®—        double x1,x2,x3,y1,y2,y3,z1,z2,z3;        x1=faces[i].p1.x;y1=faces[i].p1.y;z1=faces[i].p1.z;        x2=faces[i].p2.x;y2=faces[i].p2.y;z2=faces[i].p2.z;        x3=faces[i].p3.x;y3=faces[i].p3.y;z3=faces[i].p3.z;        Eigen::Matrix<double,4,4>matrix_44;        matrix_44 << 1,1,1,1,x1,x2,x3,x2,y1,y2,y3,y2,z1,z2,z3,-10;        double v1=abs(matrix_44.determinant())*(1.0/6.0);        matrix_44 << 1,1,1,1,x1,x1,x2,x3,y1,y1,y2,y3,z1,-10,-10,z3;        double v2=abs(matrix_44.determinant())*(1.0/6.0);        matrix_44 << 1,1,1,1,x1,x2,x3,x3,y1,y2,y3,y3,-10,-10,-10,z3;        double v3=abs(matrix_44.determinant())*(1.0/6.0);        double vs=v1+v2+v3;        Eigen::Matrix<double,1,3>f;        f << faces[i].normal.i, faces[i].normal.j, faces[i].normal.k;        Eigen::Matrix<double,3,1>p;        p << 0,0,1;        double s = f.dot(p);        if(s>0){          v=v+vs;        }else if(s<0){          v=v-vs;        }    }    printf("è¡¨é¢ç§¯ä¸ºï¼š%lf
", sum);    printf("ä½“ç§¯ä¸º: %lf
",v);    return 0;}

entry.title: ã€Šè§†è§‰SLAMã€‹3.2 å®è·µï¼šEigen
entry.content:
å®‰è£…Eigen

$ sudo apt-get install libegigen3-dev

å®‰è£…å®Œæˆåè¾“å…¥

$ sudo updatedb$ locate eigen3

æŸ¥æ‰¾å…¶å¤´æ–‡ä»¶çš„ä½ç½®ï¼Œæˆ‘å®‰è£…åœ¨äº†/usr/include/eigen3/ä¸­

å¼€å§‹ç»ƒä¹ 

ç¼–è¯‘æ—¶å‡ºäº†ç‚¹å°é—®é¢˜

è‡´ å‘½ é”™ è¯¯ : fatal error


å› ä¸ºEigenå®‰è£…åœ¨/usr/include/eigen3/ä¸­ï¼Œè€Œé»˜è®¤ç¯å¢ƒå˜é‡ä¸º/usr/includeï¼Œå› æ­¤éœ€æ·»åŠ è·¯å¾„

sudo ln -s /usr/include/eigen3/Eigen /usr/include/Eigen

å°†/usr/include/eigen3/æ˜ å°„åˆ°/usr/includeä¸‹

ä»£ç åŠè¾“å‡º

#include <iostream>#include<ctime>using namespace std;#include <Eigen/Core>#include <Eigen/Dense>#define MATRIX_SIZE 50int main(){  //Eigenå‚æ•°ï¼šæ•°æ®ç±»å‹ï¼Œè¡Œï¼Œåˆ—  Eigen::Matrix<float,2,3>matrix_23;    //2*3çš„çŸ©é˜µ  Eigen::Vector3d v_3d;        //Eigen::Matrix<double,3,1>  Eigen::Matrix3d matrix_33 = Eigen::Matrix3d::Zero();        //Eigen::Matrix<double,3,3>,å¹¶åˆå§‹åŒ–ä¸ºé›¶  Eigen::Matrix<double,Eigen::Dynamic,Eigen::Dynamic> matrix_dynamic;        //åŠ¨æ€å¤§å°  Eigen::MatrixXd matrix_x;  matrix_23 << 1,2,3,4,5,6;  cout << matrix_23 << endl;  // 1 2 3  // 4 5 6  for(int i=0; i<1; i++){    for(int j=0; j<2; j++){      cout << matrix_23(i,j) << endl;    }  }  // 1  // 2  v_3d << 3,2,1;  Eigen::Matrix<double, 2, 1>result = matrix_23.cast<double>()*v_3d;  cout << result << endl;  // 10  // 28  //Eigen::Matrix<double,2,3>result_wrong_dimension = matrix_23.cast<double>()*v_3d;  //ç»´åº¦ä¸åŒ¹é…æŠ¥é”™ï¼š/usr/include/Eigen/src/Core/Assign.h:492:3: error: â€˜YOU_MIXED_MATRICES_OF_DIFFERENT_SIZESâ€™ is not a member of â€˜Eigen::internal::static_assertion<false>â€™  matrix_33 = Eigen::Matrix3d::Random();  cout << matrix_33 << endl << endl;  // 0.680375   0.59688 -0.329554  // -0.211234  0.823295  0.536459  //  0.566198 -0.604897 -0.444451  cout << matrix_33.transpose() << endl;    //è½¬ç½®  //  0.680375 -0.211234  0.566198  //   0.59688  0.823295 -0.604897  // -0.329554  0.536459 -0.444451  cout << matrix_33.sum() << endl;    //å„å…ƒç´ å’Œ  //1.61307  cout << matrix_33.trace() << endl;     //è¿¹  //1.05922  cout << 10*matrix_33 << endl;        //æ•°ä¹˜  //  6.80375   5.9688 -3.29554  // -2.11234  8.23295  5.36459  //  5.66198 -6.04897 -4.44451  cout << matrix_33.inverse() << endl;        //é€†  // -0.198521   2.22739    2.8357  //   1.00605 -0.555135  -1.41603  //  -1.62213   3.59308   3.28973  cout << matrix_33.determinant() << endl;    //è¡Œåˆ—å¼  //0.208598  Eigen::SelfAdjointEigenSolver<Eigen::Matrix3d>eigen_solver(matrix_33.transpose()*matrix_33);  cout << "Eigen values = " << eigen_solver.eigenvalues() << endl;    //ç‰¹å¾å€¼  //Eigen values =   //0.0242899  // 0.992154  // 1.80558  cout << "Eigen vectors = " << eigen_solver.eigenvectors() << endl;    //ç‰¹å¾å‘é‡  // Eigen vectors =   //-0.549013 -0.735943  0.396198  //  0.253452 -0.598296 -0.760134  // -0.796459  0.316906 -0.514998  Eigen::Matrix<double,MATRIX_SIZE,MATRIX_SIZE>matrix_NN;  matrix_NN = Eigen::MatrixXd::Random(MATRIX_SIZE,MATRIX_SIZE);  Eigen::Matrix< double, MATRIX_SIZE,  1> v_Nd;  v_Nd = Eigen::MatrixXd::Random( MATRIX_SIZE,1 );  clock_t time_stt = clock(); // è®¡æ—¶    // ç›´æ¥æ±‚é€†  Eigen::Matrix<double,MATRIX_SIZE,1> x = matrix_NN.inverse()*v_Nd;  cout <<"time use in normal inverse is " << 1000* (clock() - time_stt)/(double)CLOCKS_PER_SEC << "ms"<< endl;       // é€šå¸¸ç”¨çŸ©é˜µåˆ†è§£æ¥æ±‚ï¼Œä¾‹å¦‚QRåˆ†è§£ï¼Œé€Ÿåº¦ä¼šå¿«å¾ˆå¤š  time_stt = clock();  x = matrix_NN.colPivHouseholderQr().solve(v_Nd);   cout <<"time use in Qr decomposition is " <<1000*  (clock() - time_stt)/(double)CLOCKS_PER_SEC <<"ms" << endl;    //time use in normal inverse is 3.494ms    //time use in Qr decomposition is 9.553ms}
